text:
Looking at Article 68 of the Spanish Constitution regarding the composition of the Congress of Deputies (Congreso de los Diputados):

Article 68.1 states: "El Congreso se compone de un mínimo de 300 y un máximo de 400 Diputados, elegidos por sufragio universal, libre, igual, directo y secreto, en los términos que establezca la ley."

This translates to: "The Congress is composed of a minimum of 300 and a maximum of 400 Deputies, elected by universal, free, equal, direct and secret suffrage, under the terms established by law."

The correct answer specifies:
- Minimum: 300 Deputies
- Maximum: 400 Deputies
- Election method: universal, free, equal, direct and secret suffrage

{"answer": "B", "reasoning": "Article 68.1 of the Spanish Constitution establishes that the Congress is composed of a minimum of 300 and a maximum of 400 Deputies, elected by universal, free, equal, direct and secret suffrage."}
